3: The name of the virus is—Punishing.
Is, is it all because of Nanami...? The virus... it's spreading and turning the entire city into hell.
Mommy and Daddy have become so strange...
Mimi's running around biting things like mad. And Mommy and Daddy kept arguing.
Nanami can only hug them as hard as she can and tell them to not be afraid. Nanami, Nanami will protect everyone...
Can you not glare at Nanami... with that expression...?
Nanami's head... hurts so much lately... Mommy... Nanami's hurt...
But... I don't know since when... Mommy's disappeared.
It's dangerous outside... Nanami... will have to find Mommy.
